channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pentagon investigates Democratic senator for telling troops to refuse 'illegal orders'

item.title: 'Just Google' me: Slender Man stabber is recaptured after fleeing her group home
item.description: Geyser and a friend lured a classmate to the woods and stabbed her 19 times in 2014. She moved from a psychiatric facility to a group home in Wisconsi...

item.title: New poll shows Latino support for Trump is slipping after gains in 2024
item.description: The Pew Research Center's survey of Latinos show majorities disapprove of the president, especially his policies on the economy and immigration.

item.title: Trump and China's leader Xi Jinping hold a call and discuss trade, Taiwan and Ukraine
item.description: Monday's call was the latest in a flurry of diplomatic and trade parries between the U.S. and China over tariffs and technology export restrictions.

item.title: It's Thanksgiving week. These are expected to be the busiest travel days.
item.description: It is a busy week for millions of Americans who are traveling for Thanksgiving.

item.title: 'Slender Man' stabber who knifed her classmate 19 times aged 12 captured after escape
item.description: Morgan Geyser who stabbed a classmate nearly to death in 2014 to please online character Slender Man was caught at a truck stop.

item.title: 3 costly home equity borrowing mistakes to avoid before 2026
item.description: To better ensure home equity borrowing success, homeowners should avoid these mistakes in the final weeks of 2025.

item.title: What is Cartel de los Soles, which the US is labelling as a terrorist organisation?
item.description: The US says it is headed by Venezuela's president and other senior politicians, but some analysts say it does not even exist.

item.title: With Medicare premiums set to rise in 2026, is Medicare supplemental insurance worth it?
item.description: Medicare costs are climbing in 2026, raising questions about whether supplemental coverage makes financial sense.

item.title: Wisconsin woman in 2014 Slender Man stabbing is found a day after walking away from group home
I watched helplessly as gunmen snatched my son, says father after Nigerian school kidnapping
item.description: The authorities are trying to rescue more than 250 schoolchildren who were abducted by raiders on motorbikes.

item.title: Belgian airports to be hit by 'major disruption' amid austerity strike
item.description: Three days of industrial action are set to affect public services and transport across the country.

item.title: Thousands of arrests by Trump’s crime-fighting task force in Memphis strain crowded jail and courts
Trump pledge to ‘immediately’ end protections for Minnesota Somalis sparks fear and legal questions
item.description: President Donald Trump has pledged to end temporary legal protections for Somalis in Minnesota, sparking fear in the state’s immigrant community.
